title: Pale Oak
content:
Pale Oak Rare 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Faithwarden's Stride: Druidic vines cannot Ensnare you and do not count as difficult terrain. Faithwarden's Vines Main Hand OnlyTopple Infused with Silvanus' strength, these staves are gifted to Faithwardens who act in defence of nature. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 600

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning

Faithwarden's Stride: Druidic vines cannot Ensnare you and do not count as difficult
